abstract: Valeo, one of the largest auto parts makers in France, has hired Bank of America Merrill Lynch to advise it on strategic alternatives that may include a sale.
snippet: Valeo, one of the largest auto parts makers in France, has hired Bank of America Merrill Lynch to advise it on strategic alternatives that may include a sale.
lead_paragraph: Valeo, one of the largest auto parts makers in France, has hired Bank of America Merrill Lynch to advise it on strategic alternatives that may include a sale, two people with direct knowledge of the matter told DealBook on Thursday.

headline.main: Valeo Hires Merrill to Explore Potential Sale
